alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:07PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Oneida County through 645 PM EDT... At 607 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Floyd, or 7 miles east of Rome, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rome, Trenton, Floyd, Oriskany, Steuben, Remsen, Holland Patent, Prospect, Barneveld and Stittville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
